notes.text:
This update for haproxy version 1.8.17 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-20615: Fixed a denial of service, triggered by mishandling the priority flag on 
short HEADERS frame in the HTTP/2 decoder (bsc#1121283)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An out-of-bounds read issue was discovered in the HTTP/2 protocol decoder in HAProxy 1.8.x and 1.9.x through 1.9.0 which can result in a crash. The processing of the PRIORITY flag in a HEADERS frame requires 5 extra bytes, and while these bytes are skipped, the total frame length was not re-checked to make sure they were present in the frame.
notes.title: CVE description
